listitem.para: Set the length of time that pluto will idle without hearing back from the peer. After this period has elapsed with no response and no traffic, pluto will declare the peer dead, and remove the SA. Set value bigger than dpddelay to enable. If dpdtimeout is set, dpddelay also needs to be set.
This option is only valid for IKEv1. IKEv2 only uses the retransmit-timeout (the timeout implies that the IKE SA is dead).
